Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva hit a walk-off six off Mohammad Nabi
Wanindu Hasaranga took 3 wickets in the 20th over without conceding a boundary
Rashid Khan injured his knee while trying to stop a boundary
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan is out of the T20 World Cup
Sri Lanka's hopes of reaching the semi-finals remain alive but slim
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka conceded only 144/8 despite frequent breakthroughs in Afghanistan's innings
Dhananjaya de Silva's partnership with Asalanka made 54 off 34 runs
Rashid Khan's figures were 2 for 31 in his spell
